channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 09:43 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 09:43 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 09:38 Threat of artillery shelling in Myrivska territorial community repulsed. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 09:38 Threat of artillery shelling in Myrivska territorial community repulsed. Stay tuned for further reports. #Myrivska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 09:33 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community has been eliminated. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 09:33 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community has been eliminated. Stay tuned for further reports. #m_Marhanets_and_the_Marhanets_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 09:12 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community- Myriv territorial community- Pokrov territorial community- Chervonohryhoriv territorial community
item.description: 🟡 09:12 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community- Myriv territorial community- Pokrov territorial community- Chervonohryhoriv territorial community#Dnipropetrovsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
